text: Ezio Selva (20 March 1902 - 29 December 1957) was an Italian diver. He competed in the men's 10 metre platform event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Italian male divers Category:Olympic divers of Italy Category:Divers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:People from Locarno
title: Ezio Selva
